item.description:
This test verifies that it's possible to move Itemz with it's Sub-Itemz from one ItemzType to another.

1. Create Project with Parking Lot Itemz Type
    
2. Create Itemz Type 1
    
3. Create few Itemz in Itemz Type 1 including associating Orphaned Itemz at TOP and BOTTOM of the list
    
4. Then move 1st Itemz which contains several level of sub-Itemz over to Parking Lot Itemz Type
    
5. At different places verify count of Itemz and also next TOP and BOTTOM Itemz Hierarchy ID.

This test verifies that it's possible to move subset of sub-Itemz structure under Itemz over to Parking Lot ItemzType

1. Create Project with Parking Lot Itemz Type
    
2. Create Itemz Type 1
    
3. Create few Itemz in Itemz Type 1 including associating Orphaned Itemz at TOP and BOTTOM of the list
    
4. Then move 1.1 Itemz which contains several level of sub-Itemz over to Parking Lot Itemz Type
    
5. Then move 1.2 Itemz which contains several level of sub-Itemz over to Parking Lot Itemz Type
    
6. We also do BULK move of 10 Itemz at the end.
    
7. At different places verify count of Itemz and also next TOP and BOTTOM Itemz Hierarchy ID.

item.description:
This test verifies that we can successfully delete ItemzType and Itemz Association. When we remove Itemz from Itemz Type then all it's SubItemz comes orphaned. Also, we remove entries from ItemzTypeJoinItemz and ItemzHierarchy tables to make sure that they work as expected.

1. Create Project with Parking Lot Itemz Type
    
2. Create Itemz Type 1
    
3. Create few Itemz in Itemz Type 1 including associating Orphaned Itemz at TOP and BOTTOM of the list. Also create some sub itemz under Itemz 1
    
4. Create an Itemz between 0 and 1 which is automatically expected to be associated to ItemzType as it's parent
    
5. Check numbers and Verify
    
6. Remove Itemz association with Itemz Type for newly added Itemz between 0 and 1 as 0.1
    
7. Check Numbers
    
8. Remove few other root level Itemz association with it's Parent ItemzType
    
9. Check Numbers
    
10. Finalize and Clean-up.

Then check and verify.
